root.name: Bomberman Live: Battlefest
root.description: Bomberman Live Battlefest is an eight player multiplayer game which has a number of features seen in Bomberman Live.Avatar SupportThe Xbox Live Arcade version features Avatar support that can be used in place of the Bomberman avatars. The avatar displayed depends on the player that is signed in along with their personal settings.CancellationThe game was slated for release on Xbox Live Arcade, Playstation Network and WiiWare. The game saw a release on Xbox Live Arcade, however after Hudson was bought out by Konami, several projects under the Hudson label were shelved, including ports and downloadable content for Bomberman Live Battlefest.
